CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​ExceptionExtensions
static public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​ExceptionExtensions

A static class for all the functions added to the System.Exception type.

Functions
HasNaturalDocsTask
static public bool HasNaturalDocsTask (
this Exception exception
)

Whether this exception has a Natural Docs task information attached to it.

AddNaturalDocsTask
static public void AddNaturalDocsTask (
this Exception exception,
string task
)

Adds a Natural Docs task information to the exception.  Multiple tasks can be added, such as "Processing file x" and "Processing topic y".  Since it is assumed that these will be added by exception handlers, it is assumed that they will be added in order of lowest child task to highest parent task.

GetNaturalDocsTasks
static public IList<string> GetNaturalDocsTasks (
this Exception exception
)

Returns the task Natural Docs was working on when the exception was thrown, or null if none.  There may be subtasks, such as "Processing file x" and "Processing topic y" so it is returned as a list.  The list is ordered from the highest parent task to the lowest child task.

HasNaturalDocsQuery
static public bool HasNaturalDocsQuery (
this Exception exception
)

Whether this exception has query information attached to it by Natural Docs.

SetNaturalDocsQuery

Adds the Natural Docs query information to the exception.  Only the first query added will be stored.  Subsequent ones will be ignored.

AddNaturalDocsQuery
static public void AddNaturalDocsQuery (
this Exception exception,
string statement,
params Object[] values
)
GetNaturalDocsQuery
static public bool GetNaturalDocsQuery (
this Exception exception,
out string query,
out List<string> values
)

Returns the query Natural Docs was working on when the exception was thrown, or returns false if none.
